en.banner_describe: How do you choose the right IT technology? Cloud is your best choice
en.curtain_chanye_boe: The partnership with UnitedStack has given us the key to getting into the cloud world.
en.curtain_chanye_meidi: This partnership allows us to enable our customers to achieve superior performance and stability in China and overseas markets.
en.curtain_chanye_oppo: Quickly deploy fast delivery, not only fast also fly. UnitedStack is our right choice.
en.curtain_chanye_protruly: UnitedStack has provided ammunition for our customers IT infrastructure, and has received a lot of praise from customers.
en.curtain_chanye_telecom: UnitedStack perfect solution to the massive broken file read and write problems, storage technology is absolutely first class.
en.curtain_chanye_wanda: Our data is stored on UnitedStack's public cloud platform, and data loss has never occurred, and UnitedStack is a trusted partner.
en.curtain_jinrong_hengfeng: The contradiction between performance and resources is perfectly resolved here in UnitedStack.
en.curtain_jinrong_minsheng: UnitedStack is a good guarantee of our simultaneous online demand and flexibility for hundreds of thousands of users.
en.curtain_jinrong_shanghai: UnitedStack's in-situ flexibility to change and shut down charges to help us save more than half of IT spending.
en.curtain_jinrong_yinlian: Unitedstack efficient and stable management of resources, worthy of our trust.
en.curtain_jinrong_zhongxin: Efficient and stable cloud computing technology for Internet companies to provide a strong support to ensure stable operation of the business.
en.curtain_zhengqi_hebei: UnitedStack help the public security resources cloud, more efficient, environmentally friendly management of the use of resources, praised.
en.curtain_zhengqi_heilongjiang: With UnitedStack powerful combination, open a new chapter in cloud services.
en.curtain_zhengqi_jiaoda: UnitedStack addresses our resource and storage issues while saving overall costs.
en.curtain_zhengqi_neimenggu: With the UnitedStack cloud computing technology and the perfect API let us achieve custom development.
en.curtain_zhengqi_zhengwu: The use of gifted cloud computing perfect solution to the expansion problem.
en.financial_five: China Citic Bank Credit Card Center
en.title: UnitedStack - Client Case

zh.banner_describe: 在向互联网＋转型的过程中，如何选择合适的IT技术？有云是您的不二之选，成功的客户案例，让您再也没有后顾之忧
zh.curtain_chanye_boe: 与 UnitedStack 的合作让我们找到了进入云世界的钥匙。
zh.curtain_chanye_meidi: 此伙伴关系的缔结令我们和客户能够在中国及海外市场获得卓越的效能和稳定性。
zh.curtain_chanye_oppo: 快速部署快速交付，不仅是快还靠谱。优思得云计算是我们正确的选择。
zh.curtain_chanye_protruly: UnitedStack 为我们客户IT架构云化提供了充足的炮弹，获得大量客户的好评。
zh.curtain_chanye_telecom: UnitedStack 完美的解决了海量碎文件的读写问题，存储技术绝对一流。
zh.curtain_chanye_wanda: 我们的数据存放在 UnitedStack 的公有云平台上从未发生过数据丢失，UnitedStack 是值得信赖合作伙伴。
zh.curtain_jinrong_hengfeng: 性能与资源的矛盾在 UnitedStack 这里被完美的解决了。
zh.curtain_jinrong_minsheng: UnitedStack 很好的保障了我们同时在线数十万用户的高并发需求和弹性。
zh.curtain_jinrong_shanghai: UnitedStack 的资源原地弹性变更和关机不收费帮助我们节约了一半以上的IT支出。
zh.curtain_jinrong_yinlian: Unitedstack 高效、稳定的管理资源，值得我们信赖。
zh.curtain_jinrong_zhongxin: 高效稳定的云计算技术为互联网企业提供强有力的支撑，保证业务稳定运行。
zh.curtain_zhengqi_hebei: UnitedStack 助力公安资源云化，更高效、环保的管理利用资源。
zh.curtain_zhengqi_heilongjiang: 与 UnitedStack 强强联合，打开云服务的新篇章。
zh.curtain_zhengqi_jiaoda: UnitedStack 解决了我们的资源与存储问题，同时节省了总体成本。
zh.curtain_zhengqi_neimenggu: 借助 UnitedStack 云计算技术和完善的 API 让我们实现定制化开发。
zh.curtain_zhengqi_zhengwu: 采用优思得云计算完美的解决了扩容问题。
